overview: Welcome to Pop Shots, a behind the scenes expos√© of an all girl pop band called A2M. Our cameras chart the rise of Alicia, Sara and Vanda, three ex-porn stars, as they take their extraordinary talents to the mainstream. We follow these musically lobotomized girls in their desperate attempt to live up to their name as they shag their way to fame & fortune. Pop Shots is a shocking, no, damning insight into the reality of the exploitative music industry! And who said sex sells!
title: Pop Shots
